---
title: "Programme"
---

The detailed scientific programme of the Iberian Prion Meeting 2026 will be announced in due time.

It will include:

- Plenary lectures  
- Symposia and oral sessions  
- Poster sessions  
- Selected short talks from abstracts  

A downloadable PDF version of the programme will also be made available here once finalized.
